title: Join our team as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager and help us achieve outstanding campaign results.
job_overview:
Join our team as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager and help us achieve outstanding campaign results.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on ability

Responsibilities include:

Running paid advertising campaigns on Google & Meta platforms.

Monitoring KPIs and making necessary adjustments.

Working remotely with flexibility and independence.

Requirements:

Minimum 1 year experience running digital ads.

Results-focused and data-driven mindset.
